page.title: 15Saint John's First School
page.content: This school first opened has a primary school in{1973.}Following reorganisation in{1983}it became a first school. When the school first opened it had{231 children on roll, this has now dropped to{108 children. At present there are 19 adults working at the school, 5 teachers, a secretary, 7 in the kitchen, 3 dinnertime helpers, a lollipop lady and the cleaners. There are{4 classes}at the moment and the headmaster is{Mr Rumney. It has quite a large playground, a play hump on the grass patch and a climbing frame made from wood. For the infants there is a special play area so they do not get pushed around. It has a fairly big hall but when the school was first opened they could not get all the children in together.
